import React, { useState } from 'react' import Variables from '../../config.js' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = Variables.firstNameWithMissingFirstLetter.split('(?!)') return (

Hi,
I'm {Variables.firstNameWithMissingFirstLetter}
web developer

Fullstack Developer / MERN Stack

CONTACT ME
) } export default Home
